name: mikroe.click.uart1wire
short_description: UART 1-Wire Click is used to convert standard UART or RS232 signals into 1-Wire® signals. Apart from other features such as the slew rate control for larger 1-Wire® busses, selectable data rate, an accurate self-calibrating time base, ESD protection and more, the main feature of the UART 1-Wire® Click, is that it manages all the sensitive signal timings involved in 1-Wire® communication, allowing rapid development of UART to 1-Wire® applications.
